Option2: Flip one switch on, enter the room. If it's not on, flip another switch on and enter again.
Option3: Flip all three switches on, then turn them off and enter the room.
Answer: Flip one switch on, leave it for a few minutes, turn it off. Flip another switch on. Enter the room.
